reference.shortdesc: The subjectRel element specifies a row in a subject relationship table. Each row creates a relationship between the cells in that row, and so creates a relationship between the subjects that are contained in the cells.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The associations between different cells in the same row are evaluated in the same way as those in a relrow.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The subjectRel element is specialized from relrow. It is defined in the subject scheme module.
